name: Abu Dhabi Amiri Flight 777-2ANER [A6-ALN] Landing in Calgary ᴴᴰ
description:
Parallel runways... Ugh. I was all set up at 35R, thinking that, since this bird was coming from the east, he would land on the east runway. Nope. He landed on the existing runway, for a shorter taxi time. All I can say is that I really need to use my scanner more often. At least I got a good close-up shot of it parked, and hopefully I can get the takeoff.

Anyway, here is a Sheikh from Abu Dhabi arriving in Calgary, after a 15 hour flight from the Middle East. This is probably the only time I will ever see a plane from the UAE in Calgary, given the relationship the Canadian government has with the Emirates :P In the close-up shots after the landing, it almost looks like the slats are literally made of gold... Hope you enjoy!

Thanks for watching! Please comment, rate, and subscribe!
____________________________________________________

FLIGHT INFO
Airline: Abu Dhabi Amiri Flight (AUH/MO)
Aircraft: Boeing 777-200ER
Registration: A6-ALN
Route: AUH-YYC
Callsign: Sultan 4 Heavy
Runway used: 35L (Argh)
FlightAware: None
